textBeforeTable: US Money: Paper currency is used for amounts of $1 or more, and coins are used for amounts under $1. Grant US Capitol Building $100.00 Benjamin Franklin Independence Hall Checking Account: To open a checking account, visit a bank and ask to open a checking account. You will need to deposit money into the account when you open it. You can deposit cash or traveler's checks, or arrange for a wire transfer from your home bank (cost around $35). American Express also offers a variety of services that make it easy to withdraw
